name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Global Sounds and Diversity**

Footprints Festival 2026 showcases an eclectic mix of genres and artists, bringing together 11 acts from across the globe. With a focus on unique and boundary-pushing sounds, the lineup spans Electronic, Psychedelic, Jazz, Indie Pop, and Anatolian Rock, alongside rarer genres like Malian Desert Blues, Traditional Iranian, and Armenian Folk. This rich tapestry of styles highlights the festival’s commitment to celebrating global music traditions while embracing contemporary innovation.

Diversity is at the heart of Footprints Festival. The lineup features artists from 10 countries, with Germany contributing the largest share, while acts from Nigeria, Iran, Turkey, and Brazil add a distinct international flavor. Representation of people of color is strong, with 7 of the 11 artists identifying as POC, reflecting a dedication to amplifying voices from underrepresented communities. Gender balance is also considered, with female and mixed-gender acts making up a significant part of the lineup.

Audience excitement is evident, with all 11 acts rated and an average score of 7.73, most receiving high praise in the 8-9 range. With all artists featured on Spotify, attendees can easily explore the festival’s offerings before the event. Footprints Festival 2026 promises an inspiring and inclusive celebration of music, blending diverse cultural roots with fresh, genre-defying creativity.
